name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Frontend Developer with 8 years of experience, I possess specialized skills in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **SCSS**, and **RxJS** to deliver high-performance user interfaces. Proficient in **ReactiveForms**, I leverage advanced techniques like **Monorepos**, **Microfrontends**, and **Module Federation** to architect scalable and maintainable applications. Additionally, I have experience with Backend for Frontend (BFF) strategies for effective integration between front-end and back-end services.
My expertise also includes using **Git**, **GitHub**, and **GitLab** for version control and collaboration, as well as implementing CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployments. I am well-versed in project management tools like **Confluence** and manage workflows using **Kanban** methodology. 
In previous roles, I’ve successfully contributed to enterprise-grade applications, ensuring compliance with industry standards and focusing on delivering exceptional user experiences.
